fields.title: Python Developer
fields.description:
We are seeking an experienced Python Developer with 2-4 years of experience to join our team. The ideal candidate will have strong experience in developing web applications using Python and Django framework.

Key Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain web applications using Python and Django
- Design and implement RESTful APIs
- Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams
- Participate in code reviews and technical discussions
- Debug and fix issues in existing applications

Requirements:
- 2-4 years of experience in Python development
- Strong knowledge of Django framework
- Experience with REST APIs and microservices
- Understanding of SQL databases
- Familiarity with Git and version control
- Experience with Docker and AWS is a plus
- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail

fields.title: Business Development Executive
fields.description:
We are looking for a dynamic Business Development Executive with 2-4 years of experience to drive our company's growth. The ideal candidate will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities and building strong client relationships.

Key Responsibilities:
- Identify and pursue new business opportunities
- Build and maintain client relationships
- Develop and implement sales strategies
- Conduct market research and competitor analysis
- Prepare and deliver presentations to potential clients
- Negotiate and close deals
- Meet or exceed sales targets

Requirements:
- 2-4 years of experience in business development or sales
- Strong communication and presentation skills
- Proven track record of meeting sales targets
- Experience with CRM systems
- Excellent negotiation skills
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team
- Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or related field
